title: Virgin Australia Entertainment
description:
Time will fly by, you just watch. There's something for everyone, free on your next flight.
How Does it work?
- Use your own device, because we know that's the screen you like and removing in-seat screens reduces fuel = less emissions.
- Be sure you have the most current operating system (e.g. Android 7 or later). Unfortunately older devices may not handle the features in this app - we're really sorry about that.
- Once onboard, set your device to flight mode and connect to the Virgin Australia WiFi network (you also need to do this to connect to the internet, but that’s a separate process, see the card onboard for more info about this).  When connected to the onboard WiFi network, launch the app and start exploring the hundreds of hours of entertainment.  We know you will find something to binge on.
- We add lots of new titles every month, there’s also daily news, weekly episodes/podcasts and special event bulletins too.
Top Tips: Please do check for updates before you fly, make sure your device is fully charged and consider bringing a battery pack for longer flights and don’t forget your ear buds!
Use the feedback form in the interactive to tell us what you think, as we do listen to your ideas and criticisms.

Time will fly by, you just watch. There's something for everyone, free on your next flight.

How Does it work?
- Use your own device, because we know that's the screen you like and removing in-seat screens reduces fuel = less emissions.
- Be sure you have the most current operating system (e.g. Android 7 or later). Unfortunately older devices may not handle the features in this app - we're really sorry about that.
- Once onboard, set your device to flight mode and connect to the Virgin Australia WiFi network (you also need to do this to connect to the internet, but that’s a separate process, see the card onboard for more info about this). When connected to the onboard WiFi network, launch the app and start exploring the hundreds of hours of entertainment. We know you will find something to binge on.
- We add lots of new titles every month, there’s also daily news, weekly episodes/podcasts and special event bulletins too.

Top Tips: Please do check for updates before you fly, make sure your device is fully charged and consider bringing a battery pack for longer flights and don’t forget your ear buds!
